altername_name: Boku to Sim no Machi Agent: Gokuaku Shachou kara Sekai o Sukue Daisakusen!
name: MySims Agents
overview: MySims Agents is a mystery-solving adventure game for the Nintendo DS and Wii, in which the player must guide agents in an effort to stop the sinister plans of Morcubus, lord of the criminal underworld.[4] This addition to the MySims franchise was released on September 29, 2009.
